item.description:
David "Avocado" Wolfe's momentum over the last decade in the fields of raw-living foods, superfoods, herbs, and chocolate has been nothing short of miraculous. David will detail the discovery of The Superfood Diet and The LongevityNOW Program all of which help you conquer candida, restore bone health, create healthy joints, lose weight, reinvent yourself, rejuvenate your mind, body, and spirit, and reverse aging with joy in your heart!

Catch A Healthy Habit Cafe Sponsors
David Wolfe's 1st visit to Fairfield!
Wednesday, April 28, 2010
Doors Open at 6pm
David will be introduced at 7pm
$30
Tickets can be purchased on-line
http://www.catchaheal...


Fairfield Community Theatre will be the site
4 doors down from Catch A Healthy Habit Cafe
39 Unquowa Rd Fairfield Ct 06824
Glen Colello or Lisa Storch 203 292-8190
Box raw food dinner will be available to order!
http://www.catchaheal...

More info on David Wolfe here: http://www.anrdoezrs....

posted by www.essenic.com
item.name: DAVID WOLFE in Fairfield CT
